attributes.action: Ban harmful Industrial Chemical Fragrance products.
attributes.additional_details:
Create awareness and Investigate the health impact of such products that are unknowingly used in public areas including Hotels, Shopping Centres, Offices, and even our Hospitals! Either as a gimmick, or to cover bad odours and poor hygiene in these property's.
Many products used include hazardous toxins and sensitisers such as Cyclohexenyl, Propionaldehyde, and Butanone .. These are harmful to lung function and many other respiritory related symptoms. They cause short term illness, long-term health complications, time off work sick, even death through pneumonia and heart attacks, causing untold strain and finanicial burden on the NHS (therefore the tax payer), plus the lost productivity in business with poor health and morale in the workplace.
